devdoc.details: The market orders is stored in structured red-black trees and doubly linked lists in each node.

acceptedContracts().details: The contact name listed in this method is also needed to be listed `requiredContracts` method.

params._amount: Amount of funds the maker wants to borrow/lend
params._rate: Amount of interest rate taker wish to borrow/lend
params._side: Order position type, Borrow or Lend

returns._0: The future value in latest maturity

returns.maturity: The maturity of the selected order
returns.side: Order position type, Borrow or Lend
returns.timestamp: Timestamp when the order was created

initialize(address,bytes32,uint256,uint2.details: Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the contract is added to the ProxyController.

params._basisDate: The basis date when the first market open
params._ccy: The main currency for the order book
params._maturity: The initial maturity of the market
params._resolver: The address of the Address Resolver contract

returns._0: The boolean if the market is matured or not
The boolean if the market is opened or not

params._amount: Amount of funds the maker wants to borrow/lend
params._rate: Amount of interest rate taker wish to borrow/lend
params._side: Order position type, Borrow or Lend

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

requiredContracts().details: The contract name list is in `./libraries/Contracts.sol`.

acceptedContracts().notice: Returns contract names that can call this contract.

createOrder(uint8,address,uint256,uint25.notice: Creates the order. Takes the order if the order is matched, and places new order if not match it.

futureValueOf(address).notice: Gets the future value in the latest maturity the user has. If the market is rotated, the maturity in the market is updated, so the existing future value is addressed as an old future value in old maturity. This method doesn't return those old future values.

getOrder(uint48).notice: Gets the market order from the order book.

isMatured().notice: Gets if the market is matured.

isOpened().notice: Gets if the market is opened.

matchOrders(uint8,uint256,uint256).notice: Gets if the market order will be matched or not. Returns zero if there is not a matched order. Reverts if no orders for specified interest rate.

presentValueOf(address).notice: Gets the present value calculated from the future value & market rate.

removeFutureValueInPastMaturity(address).notice: Remove all future values if there is an amount in the past maturity.

requiredContracts().notice: Returns the contract names used in this contract.

userdoc.notice: Implements the module that allows lending market participants to create/cancel market orders, and also provides a future value calculation module. For updates, this contract is basically called from `LendingMarketController.sol`instead of being called \ directly by the user.
